channel.title: Events on BES QUANTITATIVE ECOLOGY GROUP

item.title: Quantitative Ecology SIG Annual (Virtual) Meeting 2021
item.description: Join the BES Quantitative Ecology SIG for their 4th Annual Meeting, and second virtual meeting!

item.title: Quantitative Ecology Virtual Meeting 2020
item.description: Join the BES Quantitative Ecology SIG for their 3rd Annual Meeting, and first virtual meeting!

item.title: Quantitative Ecology Speed-Share-Your-Research
item.description: Join us for the Quantitative Ecology SIG Speed-Share-Your-Research event at the BES 2019 Annual Meeting!

item.title: Interdisciplinary model integration thematic session at BES2019
item.description: Register for our thematic session on ‘Interdisciplinary model integration to better understand biodiversity change’ at #BES2019 in Belfast.

item.title: 2019 BES Quantitative & Movement Ecology SIG Annual Meeting
item.description: Join us for the 2019 joint BES Quantitative and Movement Ecology special interest groups annual meeting in Sheffield!

item.title: Advancing your R
item.description: Want to build on your R skills for more transparant and reproducible data analysis workflows? This is the course for you!
